评论概述: Perfect fit for a glamorous look!
评论详情: I’m 4’11” and 155lbs at 33 weeks. I bought this to attend a gala and loved it so much I booked a maternity shoot with it. Perfect length with 4inch heels then flats for the maternity shoot and I loved how it dragged on the ground. Sleeves are on the long/baggy side, but easy to tuck and hide.
Perfect winter formal wear! Make sure you buy the right size for the perfect fit. Beautiful!
I really enjoyed this dress! I bought it for Halloween (Morticia Addams). It was comfortable and very sexy. Would recommend it for sure!
Really nice dress for a great price! Loved how it fit.
I wore this to a wedding. It is so comfortable and absolutely stunning. I received MANY compliments, even from strangers! I am so happy I bought this!

评论概述: As described, but is a LINT MAGNET
评论详情: My Reference: 167cm/5'6", 135 lb, with long torso, bust 34in, waist 28in, hip 37in.  The dress is as described. Velvet Burgundy looks like the photo with pleats on the tummy. Size suggested S/M, so I got the M bc I was in-between, and wasn't sure how stretchy it was. Well, it was too loose on me. If you're closer to 141-145lb, get the Medium. But if you're like my build, get the Small. I also tried it on with 2.25in heels, and the hem was a smidge on the floor. I knew this would happen after measuring my hollow to the floor, which is 55in. The dress is 57.5in. It's also supposed to be form fitting/stretchy, and the slit is a nice touch. They have the frog button on the side in case you want to adjust the slit length. I emailed them for it just in case, but didn't need it bc it was low enough to me.  But bc it was also loose on me, and touching the floor, it was a lint/hair MAGNET! I have carpet, so it was inevitable. For that, I couldn't see myself having to lint roll constantly. Honestly, as I was was trying to lint roll the dress to return, just it being near any lint attracted to it so easily. So if you hate that, don't get this dress. (Sorry in advance if anyone gets my dress and it has a little bit of lint. I tried getting it all out before returning. )  It's light weight, came in a resealable bag, and had prime shipping, which is a huge plus for delivery and returns. I was scared reading other stories about not being actually free returns. So this made it feel convenient in case it didn't fit.  Overall, don't recommend if you hate lint magnets, but recommend for chilly events. The price is reasonable for what it is.

I got an XL. It was a bit tight around the bust but that is common for me as I wear a 36I in bras. I widened the neckline to give me more space and show off a little shoulder. I love the way it turned out. The material was very soft and warm.  The dress was a little long for me. I'm 5'2" and wore 3" heels. I should have hemmed it up an inch to be perfect but it worked out well regardless.

This dress was great for the price.  Form fitting and elegant.  I wish I were a foot taller though.  At five feet tall, I had to have the dress altered and spend money on alterations. I opted to return it because of the extra expense of alterations.
Need a dress for a formal event last minute order at 8:00 p.m and it was at my door the next day. Fits perfect looks great!

I got this for a gala for school  - although it's a pretty color and soft velvet material, I didn't wear it. I ended up buying a DKNY dress.  The dress was fine - it just looks too plain and too cheap for a gala.  I'll probably wear it to a less formal event or give it to someone.
Flattering. Perfect for Halloween costume!
Fitted. Stretchy but not see through. Beautiful burgundy color. Great length.  I’m 5’3”.  Wore this with 3 inch heels. It was floor length without dragging.

评论概述: Bottom hem is not equal.  Had to pay seamstress to fix the hem.
评论详情: This dress is soft and warm and fits the curvy figure very nicely.  However, make sure you try on with shoes.  The hem was not even by about 3".  It has a slit at the front right leg and if you line them up, one side was 3" longer than the other.  The long side dragged on the floor while the other side was just about right.  Had to pay a seamstress to fix.

The dress was a hit at my Christmas party. I received many complaints!

This dress is perfect for a holiday or winter event. It has stretch and is very comfortable to wear. You can't go wrong with this one. It is stretchy so you could size down one size if in between sizes. I got a small and I am 5'5" and 130 lbs.

评论概述: Nice, Inexpensive, Quality Dress for Formal Functions
评论详情: I’m 5’3” and around 150 pounds.  I wore the dress for NYE, and I received so many compliments.  The dress fit very nicely. It hugged my curves in a classy fit that wasn’t revealing, and I appreciated that because I’m more-so on the modest end.  Though I didn’t use it, I appreciated the fact that it came with a clip for the slit. Nice consideration on the designer’s part!  I just had to pull it around from time to time if it moved to make sure the seam was aligned with how the dress was supposed to fit.  All in all, it served me well!

评论概述: I need it! In different color!
评论详情: Used for my daughter’s 15 dinner party & it was a great fit! Was very sketchy with it, I’m in between sizes of medium & large, decided to go with a large & it was perfect because it wasn’t TOO tight! Got a lot of compliments on it too, can’t wait to use it for another event!
I needed this dress for a wedding because the other 4 I bought weren’t working.  I’m busty with a mommy pooch and this dress minimized it all!!!

Fit so well, was comfortable and the slit was not too much. The neckline also was just right not too showy.
Bought it for a winter wedding. This dress is warm, comfortable, and super forgiving! Loved it and received many compliments.

I got so many compliments throughout the evening and my husband kept telling me I definitely need to save the stress.

评论概述: Most comfortable floor length dress I have ever worn
评论详情: This dress fit me like a glove right out of the Amazon bag - NO alterations, no Spanx ! I am 5'9" and weigh 128 lbs. No static cling worn with nylons. I love it.

评论概述: Elegant, flattering, classic! Size up for comfort.
评论详情: Fits as expected. I'm 5'6" and will have to wear heels with this dress. It touches the floor in bare feet. I normally wear a 4/small but chose to order a medium based on how the fit looks in the photos to be very fitted. I think if I were going for a more provocative, Jessica Rabbit style, the small would have been perfect, but the medium also fits well and looks classic and elegant. If you are between sizes like I am, go with your normal size for the sexy club look, and go with the size up for the sexy elegant look. The dress is very flattering, very forgiving. It hugs the bottom just a little even with sizing up, and I'm fairly evenly proportioned. The dress looks like it will not wrinkle easily and is washable. I'm in love. I might walk around my house wearing it like Monica and Phoebe and Rachel did with their wedding dresses on Friends. Haha!
Great quality product, fits great, and all the right places, fairly warm dress. I ordered a large, but could have gone with a medium

This dress is so comfortable. It’s classic and formal and doesn’t require any special undergarments. Very flattering and fitted. Soft and wrinkle free even packed in a suitcase. Great price. Looks way more expensive on.
very flattering,my daughter chose a different dress but this one was very flattering on a curvy body and was gorgeous
This dress is not velvet but a cheap version of it. Too baggy at waist.

I was really excited about this dress as I am going to an extremely fancy dinner coming up.  I loved how this dress looked modest but a little sexy at the same time. The material felt really cheap and once I got the dress on I realized it was a lint magnet. I vacuum my house daily but it seems to pick up lint from my carpet and anything it came in contact with. It was literally like a magnet.  When I put the dress on it reminded me of something an older lady might wear to a formal event. I’m in my late 30s and just felt like I was wearing my moms dress. Which is strange because it looks cute in many of the review pictures.  The stomach rouching was really odd too and the seams seemed to want to shift as I wrote it marking the dress feel twisted.  This one will be going back.  I will say that the fitness pretty accurate with regard to sizing

This dress is beautiful, way better than I expected. I will be using it for maternity photos in December and for my husbands semi-formal Christmas party. I am 5’1 so the dress was a bit long, if I wear heals it would be ok but I still plan on getting it hemmed so I don’t trip even with heals on. The slit is a bit high for me but they did provide a Chinese frog button to sew on to close it up a bit more and also add an extra elegant detail. I got an XL but felt like I could have sized down to a Large. A lot of reviews said the tummy area was a bit awkward but I am 6 months pregnant and it fit extremely well around the belly area but I’m not quite sure if it would look as good not pregnant, there may be a little too much material in that area. I felt really comfortable in it the material wasn’t too thin but would also keep me warm. I am very happy with this purchase and excited to wear it!
I absolutely love this dress. Fit perfectly and the price was just right.

Tried all price points for a long black dress for my sisters November wedding and here we are with a $50 amazon special. SO comfortable, no hem needed (im 5’4, with 3.5 inch heels). Chest is 34D, 150lbs, went with a Medium and it was perfect. No fussing with it at all. SO many compliments.
It makes you feel elegant. It's worth grabbing especially for the price. I wore it for a New Year's Eve Celebration. It was Perfect.

Unfortunately, it was after the holidays and my pre-holiday fit was fine, but post-holiday fit was just a little too snug through the hips!  I optioned for another dress, but didn't return this one because I felt that it may come in handy for another event in the future. With the correct slimming undergarments, I think this may make a debut in my future. It is a pretty good quality and has a festive feel and look to it. Perfect for a holiday event or gathering. You may want to go a size larger for the slim fit through the tummy area.

An amazing dress. Wore to a formal event and received many compliments. I am 5’3” and the length with heels was perfect. I did order a small and am around a size 8. It fit amazingly well. The slit up the front was very sexy without being too revealing. Would buy again.

I ordered this dress for a work dinner. I was worried about the slit being work appropriate. When I got it, the slit was as high as pictured. Right to my finger tips. I had it altered to bring the slit down and it was perfect. I'm 5' 8" and 230lbs. The arms were a little tight, so I'm glad I went with the 2XL. I would order this in every color, and wear it not altered for a non-work event. 😘
I really liked the dress. I was happy with the quality.
Slit was too high and the overall dress was very slim.

Chest area was too loose. This dress would look beautiful on someone more ample chested. Also, this long dress had a lot of blond hair stuck to it, not sure if it is human or cat hair. I am a brunette and we do not have any pets.
The dress is so beautiful! I’ll be wearing it to a formal evening wedding. It’s classy, elegant and sexy! I feel like Jessica Rabbit with the dress on hahaha! Buy it! It’s gorgeous on.

评论概述: Great fit and great value! Wore off-shoulder
评论详情: I bought this dress last minute for a special event in November 2021. I purchased a size large because I am curvy/sometimes mediums doesn’t fit me at the hips. Overall, dress was a perfect fit. I had read some reviews before purchasing and decided to wear it slightly off shoulder. Wearing it off-shoulder, I was constantly adjusting the shoulders because it would go back to v-neckline while dancing/movement. Off shoulder wear also caused the zipper to bunch in the back so I would have to pull the dress down a lot to prevent that from happening. I imagine if I would have worn it as normal it wouldn’t have done that. But overall, I love the off shoulder look in this dress and will wear it like that again hands down. The v-neckline also looks very classy. Overall a very classy but sexy dress. Modest but curves in all the right places for colder month events. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Beautiful dress for holiday formal parties
评论详情: The one complaint I have is the slit was very high; my friend actually sewed it down to a more reasonable length. Other than that it was perfect! I got lots of compliments on it!
